articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: US citizen dies in Egyptian prison after hunger strike
articles.description: The U.S. State Department says an American citizen, who was on hunger strike in prison in Egypt and who claimed he was wrongfully detained, has died after spending six years behind bars
articles.content:
CAIRO -- 
A U.S. citizen who went on a hunger strike and who claimed he was wrongfully imprisoned in Egypt died on Monday after spending six years behind bars, the State Department said.

articles.title: Elderly landlord dead after being violently pushed down stairs in dispute with tenant
articles.description: A 22-year-old man has been arrested after pushing his elderly landlord so violently down the front stairs of his building in a dispute over rent that the man died.
articles.content:
